mapper.select: select id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile, roleId, createTime, isDel from easybuy_user where loginName = #{loginName} and password = #{password} and isDel = 0

select u.id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile, phone, roleId, u.createTime, a.address from easybuy_user u,easybuy_user_address a where loginName = #{loginName} and u.isDel = 0 and a.userId=u.id and a.isDefault=1
mapper.insert: insert into easybuy_user(loginName, password, email, mobile, createTime,isDel,roleId) value (#{loginName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{mobile}, now(), 0,3);
